solution_line_template: The oldest brother is {oldest_brother_age} because {older_brother_multiplier} x {younger_brother_age} = <<{older_brother_multiplier}*{younger_brother_age}={oldest_brother_age}>>{oldest_brother_age}
Michael is {michael_age} because if {age_difference_older} + (Michael's age - {age_difference_younger}) x {age_multiplier_twice} = {oldest_brother_age} then Michael's age = {michael_age}
